topic.title: How do we make the next internet whites only?
topic.body: p2p internet is getting better by the day. Just one more big censorship attempt and it will become the default. How do we make sure only white people get to use it?

2_1AZjDLkfYwSmjM7ZJUf7HHnrF778augRMa.body:
> [lorem](#comment_1_1HXv2c6awyWdtUb8SeP7bWViMHcvxdV82X): Look if you're here and want censorship because you ''might'' encounter criminals, I will kindly ask you to fuck off and go back to clearnet. The entire point of this place is to not be censored you stupid fuck

Back to the good old days.

1_16RxPB8u2PPvMvASMreEvH3q7S5xm2LzjP.body:
> [iamdeath](#comment_20_1DcE9QfZbfLZhXxgtQ8Ui3oMZvs9NVjqZB): Drag the "0" in the top right of this page to the left until you can see the globe. It may take a while to load. You will notice there is very little in Africa. they are probably just white people who have jobs there or something.

Yeah but what about chinks and hindoo poo in loos and mexicans? How do we make sure this new technology is out of their reach?
